relation.text: 1765 To Charles & To Mrs H My Dear Brother , Yours of the 14 th . of Jany . came
appear to me quite differently from what they did eight years ago
thought my health and the state of mind I was then in absolutely requir 'd . Mrs. H . is now
my departure from this place for the first of May
the middle of June . It will
will take her Daughter under her own tuition in the beginning of July
h a v r e now
Yours most faithfully & Affectionately Frederick Hamilton Florence Feby . 18 th . 1765
